full_summary:
=================================================
### Tender Notice
#### Expiring Tender: Request for Proposal for Strategic Partners
=================================================

**Reference Number**: W8485-258180
**English Title**: Strategic Partners Request for Proposal (RFP)
**French Title**: Demande de propositions pour partenaires stratégiques

**Procurement Details**
-------------------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: July 3, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Publication Date**: May 24, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 23, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Good(s)/Service(s)**
-------------------------

* Pointers
* Infrared IR Illuminator

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
**Delivery Location**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

* **Name**: Mac Davis-Kelly
* **Email**: mac.davis-kelly2@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (819) 939-6101

**Tender Document Links**
---------------------------

* **English Language Tender Document**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38812/w8485-258180-lad-peq-15-rfp-en.pdf>
* **French Language Tender Document**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38812/w8485-258180---lad-peq-15-rfp-fr.pdf>

Please note that the tender has already expired and is no longer open for submissions. Please refer to the provided documents for more information regarding this opportunity. 

This text should be effectively rephrased to capture all the relevant information, while excluding unnecessary information and also kept concise (in line with the requirements). 

Also, note that trans-lingual information sharing is captured to keep the rules in place for amatching local french translations for regions ect. ect
